metadata.title: CVE-2020-21679 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in WritePCXImage function in pcx.c inGraphicsMagick 1.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service viaconverting of crafted image file to pcx format.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
